import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import '../styles/Destination.css' import * as assests from '../utils/assets' import { destinations } from "../data.js" let imgT: string = "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSed9KXasqN7dg_kOK2JeGHr0_r8EB4E9awRpqg_Eq66lTPMFArhwDbeXdK7HA_upxNYMc&usqp=CAU" let testtext: string = 'and so many text' const Destination = () => { return (
{/* LEFT */}

01 Pick your destination

{/* RIGHT */}
{destinations.map((planet: object | string) => )}

MOON

{testtext.repeat(20)}

AVG. DISTANCE

384,400 KM

EST. TRAVEL TIME

3 DAYS

) } export default Destination;
